Name: Squeal
Description: Deal 1 damage to each non-elite enemy.

Name: Cover in Mud
Description: Blank one effect of an encounter card until tomorrow.

Name: Knock Over
Description:
Deal 1 damage to one or two enemies.
Rotate one hero card on your field or on your partner's field.

Name: Panic
Description: Deal 2 damage to one enemy. If there are more encounter cards on the field than there are hero cards on your field, also deal 2 damage to another enemy.

Name: Mess Around
Description:
Remove 1 ⏳ from one duration.
Blank one effect of an encounter card until tomorrow.
Rotate one hero card on your field or on your parnter's field.

Name: Splash About
Description: Deal 1 damage to one or two enemies. Blank each effect of each enemy dealt damage this way until tomorrow.

Name: Root Out
Description:
Deal 2 damage to each enemy.
Remove 1 ⏳ from each duration.
